name: Crazy Retro Lander
description:
Crazy Retro Lander

A New game from Crazy Retro Game Studios

A slow paced game for gamers that like to think and plan.

Consider this an evolving mini game. Play it and send me your feedback to impact it's growth.

Upcoming changes

Real physics

Dynamic Levels

Improved graphics

Play it now and be part of Crazy Retro Lander's evolution.

SoundTrack from https://itch.io/profile/fardifferent Sound FX by https://mattflat.itch.io/

Follow me on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram or Check out my youtube channel for trailers and gameplay

For something faster paced check out my other games here

#crazyretrolander
